text: Pablo Hernández (12 February 1940 – 1 January 2021) was a Colombian cyclist. He competed in the individual road race and team time trial events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born in Suesca, Colombia. Fernández died on 1 January 2021 in Pereira, Colombia at the age of 80.De luto ciclismo nacional: la última carrera hacia la eternidad Falleció el excampeón Pablo Hernández ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Colombian cyclists Category:Olympians for Colombia
title: Pablo Hernández (cyclist)
